name: Bear Party: Fall Down IO
description:
Are you ready to compete against heroes? Run around the io arena, choose the right tile to stay, and do not fall down! Play Bear Party, have lots of fun and become one last standing.

In this casual io game, your main goal is to survive in the arena full of enemies. To stay alive for five nights you should be smart, fast, and furious! Guess the right tile, run fast there and push other players out of the arena.

The rules are super simple to learn. Stay on the tile with the same image the host shows you on the card. Be careful! All other tiles will disappear in a few seconds. Stay alive as many rounds as you can and do not fall down!

Why you’ll live the puzzle survival game:

- Lots of addicting levels
- Fun io gameplay
- Casual brain teaser
- Famous characters
- Simple controls
- Beautiful graphics
- Unique player skins

So what are you waiting for? Join the hilarious survival puzzle right now! Download Bear Party, push your enemies out of the arena and become the top player! Puzzle matching has never been that exciting!
